Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses rrted WB: Jackson, Central Park, Congress, Pulaski, and Jackson; EB: Jackson, Pulaski, Fifth Ave, Independence, and Jackson nr Jackson/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to construction near Jackson/Hamlin.

Westbound buses will operate via Jackson, Central Park, Congress, Pulaski, and Jackson.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Pulaski, Fifth Avenue, Independence, and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ellis/53rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near Ellis/53rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near Ellis/53rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
